user.finder.location.accessible.label: Only barrier-free vaccination sites
user.welcome.title: Welcome!
user.welcome.intro-1: You are now only a few clicks away from your appointment.
user.welcome.intro-2: We will ask you a few questions so you can get the right vaccine. The data remains on your device and is not transmitted.
user.finder.location.title: Vaccination sites
user.finder.location.intro: Choose from the available options where you would like to be vaccinated.
user.finder.appointment.title: Appointments
user.finder.appointment.back-link: Back to selection of vaccination site
user.welcome.question2_value: Was your last vaccination more than 3 months ago?
user.welcome.question3_value: Are you younger than 30 or pregnant?
user.welcome.question4_error: Unfortunately, appointments for child vaccinations are not (yet) offered via the portal. We will try to expand the offer as soon as possible and ask for your patience until then.
user.welcome.form_error: Please answer all questions, otherwise we will not be able to find appointments for you. All your personal data will only be stored on your personal device and will not be transmitted or passed on to a server.
user.welcome.question2_error: It must be 3 months since your last vaccination appointment before you can receive a booster.
user.finder.verify.title: Overview
user.finder.verify.intro: This is your selected appointment. Please check carefully that everything is correct.<0/> You can then finalise your booking.
user.faq.title: Questions & Answers
